metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0093 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In exif_data_save_data_entry of exif-data.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9 Android-10Android ID: A-148705132

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-0093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-8').
sleuthkit package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
